helpCenter.help_center: Welcome to the Help Center, where you can find info to help you get started and familiarise yourself with Inforelay Global information, or get help with an issue.
helpCenter.inforelay_info: Inforelay has made international COVID-19 information relaying as simple as ordering a taxi or a pizza using an app. With Inforelay you can share COVID-19 related informations from anywhere you are with all the world, 24/7. All your need to know is the information article's name, source and date. No Need To Sign up through our website, just load our content editor, write article, and start sharing around the globe at lightning speed. We automatically add your article to the waiting queue in orther to verify before sharing definitively, and give you the power with our clear and user-friendly app.
helpCenter.charges_fees: Fortunately goodbye to high fees, commissions and hidden charges. Inforelay is totally free of charge. However your generous contribution will help us keep growing.
helpCenter.world_news: Our state-of-the-art processing platform is connected to the global covid-19 information network, so we can track all informations and keep you informed on the status of every single information.
helpCenter.happy_team: Inforelay Support team is happy to help you via online chat or email.

documentation.publish_news: Click on the 'PUBLISH A NEW INFORMATION' button
documentation.customize_content: You can customize your content with the WYSIWYG editor.
documentation.format_of_text: Click the editor icons to format your text.
documentation.attach_file: You have the possibility to attach media (links, images) to your step.
documentation.click_on_article: Click on the article you want to share to move to the details page
documentation.share_link: At the bottom side of the article image, click on any link to share it.
documentation.copy _url: Also you can just copy the 'PUBLIC URL', on the copy icon.
documentation.type_keywords: Type any keywords into the search box
documentation.filter_articles: You can also filter the articles by: 'title', 'description', 'badge', and 'author' properties
documentation.support_team: Inforelay Support team is happy to help you via online chat or email.
